name: Netflix Rows
description: Transform your Jellyfin home screen into a Netflix-like experience with dynamic rows, smart content discovery, genre-based organization, and a custom watchlist. Features responsive design, theme integration, and advanced configuration options.
overview: Netflix Rows Plugin f√ºr Jellyfin - Transforms the Jellyfin home screen into a premium Netflix-style streaming experience. Features include dynamic content rows (My List, Recently Added, Random Picks), intelligent genre-based organization, comprehensive theme integration, responsive mobile design, and advanced performance optimizations. Includes extensive configuration options for customizing the streaming experience to match user preferences and library characteristics.

versions.changelog: Production-ready release v1.0.2.1: Complete exception handling overhaul with specific exception types, LoggerMessage performance improvements, comprehensive code quality enhancements, fixed GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline, and enterprise-grade documentation. Features Netflix-style UI with horizontal rows, smart content discovery, advanced configuration options, theme integration, responsive mobile design, and accessibility support. Includes performance optimizations, memory management improvements, and production-ready error handling for enterprise environments.
